page.title: 01SHAW
page.content: Shaw is a small town situated north of Oldham and east of the Pennines.It was formerly heavily dependent on the cotton industry but now most people work in other jobs outside Shaw.It is now becoming much more 0f a residential suburb on the fringes of the Greater Manchester connurbation as can be seen from the patterns of population movement.In response to the growth of population new housing and schools have been built.This is naturally leading to a reduction of the farm land available.However,Shaw still retains much of its community identity,centred round the open market held every Thursday.
